comment: No, you will be asked COVID screening questions once you arrive to the Vaccine clinic!
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (n / no)

            :ARG1 (q / question-01
                  :ARG1 (s / screen-01
                        :ARG3 (d / disease
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "COVine"))))
            :ARG2 (y / you)
            :time (a2 / arrive-01
                  :ARG1 y
                  :ARG4 (c / clinic
                        :mod (v / vaccine-01)))))
